channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light doesn’t turn on., 10th August
item.description:
Street light at corner between Crescent Road and Wickham Road in Beckenham doesn’t turn on at night. This section of the road is currently pitch dark and could potentially be a road safety hazard to pedestrians. Please kindly arrange repair. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shattered glass concourse by bus stop Pickford lane near netting shop bus stop, 10th August
item.description:
Shattered glass left on pavement. Litter left on concourse. Concourse is in a terrible state uneven concourse due to damage. Dangerous under foot. This shouldn’t have been left today! No refuge sweepers today! Why hasn’t the concourse been fixed outside the Thai message shop in a state. Someone could easily trip.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leak under pavement, 10th August
item.description:
Water has been leaking from under the pavement outside number 14 for several months. The pavement surface has broken up and the extent of the leak means there is now water running along the gulley. In hot weather, this smells.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Gloucester Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle parked on concourse outside animal protection charity shop, 10th August
item.description:
This vehicle Is parked every Sunday outside the animal rescue charity shop in Pickford lane. I think the car belongs to the bottle shop owner or newsagents owner/worker but shouldn’t be on pavement concourse! They park it and leave it there all day. The reg plate no is clearly shown in the photo. This is against the law.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household waste outside 51 Maury, 10th August
item.description:
Persistent flytipping outside the garage of 51 Maury - this time a chair, bag of rubbish, cardboard box. Box is clearly labelled 51 Maury so seems to come from the household itself.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maury Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post light stopped working, 10th August
item.description:
The two post lights in St Vincent street hasn’t been working for few weeks now and it’s a bit concerning to walk there at night since it’s a a quieter street and a bit smaller.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 110, Marylebone High Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Bus Stop, 10th August
item.description:
